Teapot as a bird feeder: Attach a bird feeder to the spout of the teapot and fill it with birdseed.
Teapot as a candle holder: Place a tea light candle inside the teapot and use it as a candle holder.
Teapot as a flower vase: Fill the teapot with water and add flowers to it. The spout can be used to the flowers.
Teapot as a plant holder: Use the teapot as a holder for small plants.
Teapot as a flowerpot: Fill the teapot with soil and plant flowers in it.
